Mobile Number Password Enter Password Enter valid email id Number or Email address cannot be empty Please enter a valid number. Please enter a valid password. "Mobile number cannot begin with a '0'." Please enter valid email address Change Mobile No You will receive One Time Password(OTP) on the registered mobile no: %s
Hello blank fragment "Didn't receive OTP?" Resend OTP is successfully sent. "You have exceeded maximum login attempts. Session expired, Try logging in again." This will exit the app. Do you want to continue? Unable to connect. Please check your internet connection.
Question Play again 15 Correct Opps the answer was wrong Time Up Play Game Quit Next âœ–
//Feedback Send \nUs Your \nFeedback Please submit your feedback below in given format
//Buttons Continue Submit
// Assessment
Enter Your Name
Question 1 Which of the following are the primary goals of network security? (Choose 3 best answers)
Redundancy Availability Integrity Confidentiality Remote access
Question 2 Which of the following statements best describes confidentiality of information?
Refers to keeping the data private and preventing unauthorized access Refers to making the data available any time that a client wants to access Refers to keeping the data secure from being modified in storage or transmit Refers to making the data private, secure and available
Question 3 According to Cisco, organizational data is classified into four categories. Which of the following is NOT classification category?
Public Sensitive Confidential Private Trusty worthy
What are the THREE security solution that Cisco recommends for comprehensive security? Question 4
Managerial Physical Logical Administrative Geographical
Question 5 Which of the following is true about Dynamic ARP Inspection (DAI) employed in a network switch? (Choose 3 best answers)
Intercept and examine all ARP request and response packets in a subnet and discard packets with invalid IP-to-MAC address bindings Prevents STP attacks DAI can prevent common man-in-the-middle (MIM) attacks such as ARP cache poisoning Prevents mis-configuration of client IP addresses Prevents CAM table overflows
Question 6 Which one of the following types of attack intentionally introduced a back door to a system?
Passive attack Active attack Close-in attack Insider attack Distribution attack
Question 7 An organization screens its employees for any previous criminal records, as part of implementation of organizational security. It may be categorized as:
Physical security Administrative security Logical security Vulnerability
Question 8 Which three of the following are the Confidentiality attack strategies? (Choose 3 best answers)
Packet capture Password attack Dumpster driving Botnet Social engineering TCPSYN Flood
Question 9 Which of the following are the Integrity attacks? (Choose 3 best answers)
Data diddling
Question 10 Which of the following are the attacks on availability of a resource? (Choose 2 best answers)
Denial of Service
End test
"Name: " Test Result "Score: "
